text: Ruda is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Gidle, within Radomsko County, Łódź Voivodeship, in central Poland. It lies approximately north-west of Gidle, south of Radomsko, and south of the regional capital Łódź. In 2006 the village had an approximate population of 200. ==References== ==External links== * Gmina Gidle website * Pictures of Ruda and its neighbourhood Ruda
title: Ruda, Gmina Gidle
